entry_groups.description:
Clip of my idol step dance tutorial / lesson from the 3d debut stream! I hope this can be useful for anyone looking to try learning idol step! Full Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BZHjmV3qFLc&t=1s

*This is not mirrored but you can learn from the video the same as if it is mirrored since the movement for both left and right are the same! :)
